Dealer - Class in blackjackplayground
Just like in the game of blackjack, the Dealer controls the flow of the game.

dealPressed() - Method in class blackjackplayground.Dealer
Method thats called when player starts a new deal by pressing the deal button.
Deck - Class in blackjackplayground
Class represents a deck of basic playing cards that can be shuffled, and from witch cards can be dealt from
Deck() - Constructor for class blackjackplayground.Deck
Creates a new Deck object that stores the 52 different playing cards in order

Declares how much the player won with a split game.

Declares the winner of the deal First checks the values of the hands in question.
disableHand(String) - Method in class blackjackplayground.GameUI

doubleHand(Hand) - Method in class blackjackplayground.Dealer
Doubles the amount of bet in a hand, then deals one Card and checks if the hand busts.
